A4.text: Haaland scored his 35th league goal of the campaign

A5.text: Haald finished the Premier League season with 22 goals, behind Mohamed Salah and Alexander Isak, scoring on the final day in a 2–0 win over Fulham

A6.text: Haaland scored the most goals to win the Golden Boot, with 36 in 2022–23.

A7.text: The Premier League Golden Boot is currently held by Mohamed Salah with 29 goals.

A8.text: Most goals scored in a season – 52, Erling Haaland, 2022–23
